## Client.withUserKey() method

Create a new gRPC client instance from a supplied key and secret

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static withUserKey(key: KeyInfo, host?: string, debug?: boolean): Promise<Client>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | KeyInfo | The KeyInfo object containing {<!-- -->key: string, secret: string, type: 0<!-- -->}<!-- -->. 0 === User Group Key, 1 === Account Key |
|  host | string |  |
|  debug | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Client&gt;
